name: places/ChIJ53i18AL2wokRv_7_mFC2yYg
adrFormatAddress: 1904 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10029-4601, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely horrible rip off place.  I agree with the other 1 star reviews.  Stay away!!!!!  I wanted to go there because it is local and the name indicates a bargain, but it was overpriced and a waste of valuable time.  The older lady who waited on me was very distracted.  No one in the store but it took her forever to help me.  First she demanded my ins card and prescription before letting me see any glasses or giving me any information.  After I gave her all of that then it took her forever to actually come back and help me.  She constantly found tons of other things to do and aimlessly wondering around before finally coming back to me and telling me Lenses start at $610!  $610 is outrageous even for nyc.  No specs for less here!  I just left, I didn't tell her I had called a few days before and was told progressive lenses start at $400 which, by the way, is already higher than other optical places in NYC.  Which is a shame because I may have been willing to just buy the frames with my insurance but I felt like I was being taken advantage of so I just left immediately.  There's a reason there's so many bad reviews! Place is dirty, service is terrible, prices are high.

originalText.text:
Wish I had taken the time to read a few reviews. There is a real reason why this place has 3 stars and I risked it all still.. I wasted my time.. So they are a local store so I figured I'd give them a shot. Also keep business local.

I made an appointment and the specialist there was very knowledgeable per my experience.

Another thing can be said about the people in the front desk. There was clearly a line and I was next but was skipped twice. When I went up to the gentleman and tried to ask for help he asked me who had originally helped me and then clarified I had to wait for her as he walked away. The older lady with glasses was helping everyone else but me even though she called me to the counter because I was next. I grew impatient standing there watching her even skip over me again and circle back to her co-worker to help him again with charging a customer their credit card.

Clearly here they value scams and $$ above anything else. If you have cash or credit come here they will give you priority over insurance covered clients. After reading a few reviews I know it is best to skip this location. This is why writing a review is important to help other fellow consumers. I will be mentioning all this to the insurance and make a complaint about this location.

originalText.text:
To be clear and honest the service and Attitude I got from the staff was great.  They came off extremely friendly. Why 1 star. I had a VDT  voucher ‚Äúvideo display terminal‚Äù from DC37. I sit in front of a screen sometimes up to 16 shifts mandated working doubles.

This company gave me regular glasses with no protection. When confronted I was told the VDT voucher was only good for another frame + prescription lenses. I called DC37 to get information about this and was told the VDT voucher is suppose to be good for frames and lenses with a special filter to filter out blue light from the monitors.

I spoke to the manager supposedly and he refuses to acknowledge this and insisted if I wanted the protection or would cost money out of pocket to have it in the lenses.

If that‚Äôs the case while handing over a VDT voucher why wouldn‚Äôt have they even mentioned that knowing what they are being used for? I contacted DC37 and notified them. At this point I‚Äôll let them do whatever they do
If anything.

I personally will never do business with this place again.

Crooks

originalText.text: I have been going to Specs for less for more than a decade.  The staff is friendly,  most of all the assistance manager Jose is a doll. He has so much patience, kindness and helps you with all the needs for your eyes. I give this place a double üëç up. I just love my new glasses I picked.

originalText.text: This place sucks. They won't give you information over the phone? Tf I need my perscription info. They obviously dint want you ordering from somewhere else. So rude as well never going back
